name: Opposites Attract (Game Jam Game)
description:
You control the frog with the arrow keys.

The theme of the game jam was Opposites Attract.

I'd been thinking about doing a turn based game before and then had the thought of a princess and a frog as the opposites that attract.

The idea is that the princess always walks as directly as possible towards the frog, so you have to be careful so she does not end up in trouble, while staying out of trouble yourself.

Unfortunately I didn't really have the time to make a good difficult level as it took all the time I had to simply make the movement and some simple graphics work.

I've since been playing around with I'm making a level editor for myself and a system to make the wolves move in more complicated patterns. But at this point the project will not be worked on further.
